Phonological transcription filter
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.local_lm.phon_filter

+------------+--------------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.local_lm.phon_filter |
+------------+--------------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                                  |
+------------+--------------------------------------+


Inputs
======

+--------+----------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                |
+========+========================================+
| corpus | TarredCorpus<RawTextLinesDocumentType> |
+--------+----------------------------------------+

Outputs
=======

+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                                |
+========+========================================================================+
| corpus | :class:`~pimlico.datatypes.tar.SegmentedLinesDocumentTypeTarredCorpus` |
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
